summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.9°C) and outside temperature (down 2.0°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 805 m) and light levels (up 11841 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 13833 lux), cloud levels (up 1502 m), feels like temperature (up 4.9°C), and outside temperature (up 3.6°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 805.1m lower than yesterday, 611.6m lower than the past week, 1501.9m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 745m minimum and 3580m maximum, with an average of 1181.3m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1792.9m and 2680m.

Today’s average dew point temperature is 0.1°C lower than yesterday, 0.5°C lower than the past week.

Yesterday, the dew point temperatures ranged from a minimum of 10.1°C to a maximum of 15.5°C, averaging 12.4°C; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 12.9°C and 12.4°C respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Possible light showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and dim or diffuse light conditions. Changeable conditions.
